items.sentence: I went to Boston with one of Tom\'s friends.
Tom finally got the courage to ask Mary out.
Tom finished doing his homework an hour ago.
Tom forgot to do what he was supposed to do.
I just said I didn\'t want to talk about it.
I\'m going to stick around and wait for Tom.
The teacher treated all the students fairly.
I couldn\'t have asked for a better teacher.
We couldn\'t find a place to park near here.
We don\'t have to pay all these bills today.
Tom doesn\'t know whether to do that or not.
Who do you think will take over the company?
I\'ve just been told never to do that again.
I\'ll tell Tom you\'re not going to do that.
I wish you\'d just tell me what\'s going on.
How did you know that Tom wanted to do that?
Tom showed up at Mary\'s house unexpectedly.
Have you made plans for dinner this evening?
Didn\'t you know I used to be a taxi driver?
The hypnotist made Tom cluck like a chicken.
